</td></tr>

[onScroll()](./obsidian-typings.markdownscrollableeditview.onscroll.md)

</td><td>

</td></tr>

</td><td>

Close editor suggest and removes highlights on click.

</td></tr>

</td><td>

Add classes to the editor, functions as a toggle.

[show()](./obsidian-typings.markdownscrollableeditview.show.md)
